mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T16_NOTICE_COMMENT ( NOT_ID , PER_ID , COMMENT , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{nOTID} , #{pERID} , #{cOMMENT} , #{cREATEDATE} , #{cREATETIME} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T16_NOTICE_COMMENT SET NOT_ID = #{nOTID} , PER_ID = #{pERID} , COMMENT = #{cOMMENT} , CREATE_DATE = #{cREATEDATE} , CREATE_TIME = #{cREATETIME} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOT_ID AS "nOTID" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , COMMENT AS "cOMMENT" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T16_NOTICE_COMMENT WHERE ID = #{iD}
SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOT_ID AS "nOTID" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , COMMENT AS "cOMMENT" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T16_NOTICE_COMMENT WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOT_ID AS "nOTID" , PER_ID AS "pERID" , COMMENT AS "cOMMENT" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" FROM T16_NOTICE_COMMENT WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
